locations.name: Cape Town
locations.description: South Africa's vibrant 'Mother City', known for Table Mountain, diverse culture, and scenic coastline.

locations.name: Stellenbosch
locations.description: A historic town central to the Cape Winelands region, famous for its vineyards, oak-lined streets, and Cape Dutch architecture. Represents the overnight stay in the Winelands.

locations.name: Madikwe Game Reserve
locations.description: A large, malaria-free Big Five game reserve in South Africa known for exclusive wildlife viewing experiences away from crowds.

locations.name: Benguerra Island
locations.description: An island within Mozambique's Bazaruto Archipelago, renowned for its pristine beaches, turquoise waters, and coral reefs, offering relaxation and marine activities.
